params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.file_name
params.description: The name of the generated file. The default is manifest with the extension suffix corresponding to the Manifest [type][google.cloud.video.livestream.v1.Manifest.type]. If multiple manifests are added to the channel, each must have a unique file name.

params.name: data.type
params.description: Required. Type of the manifest, can be HLS or DASH.

params.name: data.mux_streams
params.description: Required. List of MuxStream [key][google.cloud.video.livestream.v1.MuxStream.key]s that should appear in this manifest. - For HLS, either fmp4 or ts mux streams can be specified but not mixed. - For DASH, only fmp4 mux streams can be specified.

params.name: data.max_segment_count
params.description: Maximum number of segments that this manifest holds. Once the manifest reaches this maximum number of segments, whenever a new segment is added to the manifest, the oldest segment will be removed from the manifest. The minimum value is 3 and the default value is 5.

params.name: data.segment_keep_duration
params.description: How long to keep a segment on the output Google Cloud Storage bucket after it is removed from the manifest. This field should be large enough to cover the manifest propagation delay. Otherwise, a player could receive 404 errors while accessing segments which are listed in the manifest that the player has, but were already deleted from the output Google Cloud Storage bucket. Default value is 60s.

methods.name: getMaxSegmentCount

The minimum value is 3 and the default value is 5.

methods.name: getSegmentKeepDuration
methods.description:
How long to keep a segment on the output Google Cloud Storage bucket after it is removed from the manifest. This field should be large enough to cover the manifest propagation delay. Otherwise, a player could receive 404 errors while accessing segments which are listed in the manifest that the player has, but were already deleted from the output Google Cloud Storage bucket. Default value is 60s.
